text:
ONLY THE VERY BEST IN EVERY LINE!
EKCO TV
— a quality product from the oldest and biggest
.TV-factory in England. Sharpest pictures and
excellent sound. Is ingeniously uncomplicated
in construction and recnogized for its very low
need of service.
BELL
— a good and low priced Hi-Fi-amplifier.
TENNA
— the most popular antenna rotor. A novelty
on the Swedish market.
/Igpl
AMPEX
— American taperecorder of highest class. The
professional machines are recognized the very
best of the world.
COLUMBIA TV
— a higly sensitive TV-receiver with extra¬
ordinarily good qualities for distance reception.
The most lowpriced TV-receiver on the Swedish
market.
EKCO CAR RADIO
— one of the best from England
— the very best car radio antenna constructed
up till now. 100-per cent protection against
humidity shortcircuit. Can be screwed off and
put into the car by parking.
SOUNDCRAFT
— the very best sound tape in the world. Winner
of »Oscar» in Hollywood as the best recording
medium.
